title: Phantom Loaves
location: Market Ward -> The Charity Bread Queue
description: The charity bread program is being gamed. Merchant Prell uses proxy children to collect dozens of loaves and resells them at inflated prices. Sister Adda is heartbroken and asks you to stop it.

turns.narrative: Sister Adda runs out by the seventh family. You observe a heavyset man in a trader's cloak collecting loaves from multiple children standing in as proxies.
turns.consequence_a: He resells loaves three blocks away for eight times their value to desperate Lower Ward families.
turns.choice_b: Confront him in the queue directly
turns.consequence_b: He denies it loudly then attempts to bribe you with a silver coin.

turns.narrative: Prell uses hungry children as proxies, paying them one copper each. They are participating willingly but are genuinely hungry themselves.
turns.choice_a: Report Prell to the Ward Warden
turns.consequence_a: Prell is fined and banned from the charity queue permanently.
turns.choice_b: Offer the proxy children legitimate work so they stop working for Prell
turns.consequence_b: Adda employs them as distribution helpers. Prell loses his network.

turns.narrative: With Prell neutralised, Sister Adda wants safeguards to prevent recurrence.
turns.choice_a: Design a queue token system — one stamped token per family per day
turns.consequence_b: Adda compiles the list over a week. It becomes the Ward standard.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
